description.text:
You would like to know more about the different Courts?
Well you choose the best Court, we're by far the most fun!
 Nothing like those arrogant Fey of the $(b;summer)Summer Court$(), they think they rule the Fey world.
 The $(b;winter)Winter Court$() is just scary...-the little pixie shivers-
 Which reminds me! Now that you bound your soul to the Spring Court we should make an offering for $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$()! 
 Maybe you can make some of those delicious human made $(b;spring)cakes$() a $(b;spring)give$() them to me?

What is that smell? What are you making?$(n)The cake for $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$()?$(n)No, no, no, this treasure is mine...$(n)Lets quickly eat it before $(b;spring)Prince Oberon$() finds out!$(n)$(i)*The tiny fey plunges her face inside of the cake*$()$(n)Phew, I'm stuffed. I think I might die. Huff puff.....got more?
